titleStmt.title: Politicall observations upon the fall of Seianus. Written in Italian by Gio. Baptista Manzini. And translated into English by Sr. T.H.
Della peripetia di fortuna. English
titleStmt.author: Manzini, Giovanni Battista, 1599-1664.
T. H., Sir (Thomas Hawkins), d. 1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Anne Griffin, for Godfrey Emondson [i.e. Emerson],
